漲停.definition: (of a stock price) to rise to the daily upper limit (resulting in a temporary halt in trading of the stock)

漲停板.definition: daily upper limit on the price of a stock

漲價.definition: to appreciate (in value); to increase in price

漲勢.definition: rising trend; upward momentum (e.g. in prices)

漲姿勢.definition: Internet slang for 長知識|长知识[zhang3 zhi1 shi5]

漲幅.definition: extent of a rise (in prices etc); amount of increase; growth (typically expressed as a percentage)

漲滿.definition: full to the point of overflowing (fluid, emotions etc)

漲粉.definition: to get more fans; to gain followers

漲紅.definition: to turn red (in the face); to flush (with embarrassment or anger)

漲落.definition: (of water, prices etc) to rise and fall

漲跌幅限制.definition: limit up, limit down; limit on daily price variation
